E14014, Cordoba, Spain Departamento de Quimica Organica Universidad de Cordoba, Campus de Rabanales Edificio Marie Curie (C-3), Ctra Nnal IV-A, Km 396, E14014 Cordoba Spain bDepartamento de Quimica Organica, Universidad de Cordoba, Campus de Rabanales, Edificio Marie Curie (C-3), Ctra Nnal IV-A, Km 396, E14014, Cordoba, Spain ⁎ Corresponding authors. This article has been retracted : Please see Elsevier Policy on Article Withdrawal (https : //www.elsevier.com/locate/withdrawalpolicy). This article has been retracted at the request of the Editor-in-Chief and the Publisher. Similarities were found between images in this article, and an article published in ACS Sustainable Chemistry and Engineering, “Functionalized CeO2/SBA-15 Materials as Efficient Catalysts for Aqueous Room Temperature Mono-dehydration of Sugar Alcohols” (DOI https : //doi.org/10.1021/acssuschemeng.0c00494) by the same authors, and submitted for publication during similar timeframes. Reader concerns were initially reported in the PubPeer thread : https : //pubpeer.com/publications/2173D5CA60FD8C71134D4B9283C78D This reuse of data without appropriate attribution represents a severe abuse of the scientific publishing system. We apologize to the readers/scientific community for the inconveniences caused by this retraction.
